attributes.action: All Speed cameras are a nuisance and obstruction in the road and should be removed by section 149 of the highways act 1980 chapter 66
attributes.additional_details:
This E-PETITION is made out not only to the Department of transport, but also to the Home Office and Ministry of justice.

ALL TYPES of speed cameras are a NUISANCE in the road and an obstruction to driving. And should be all removed. This is requested by legislation of the Highways Act 1980, chapter 66, section 149.

Speeding and other driving offences should be reported by other drivers so that drivers govern and enforce each other to the police and authorities by complaints that are monitored and evaluated with driver re training issued when required.
